item.title: Golang JWT Authorisation
item.description: A simple golang implementation of JWT JSON Web Tokens authorisation. This code will demo how JWT is used to authorise user and return their resource access scopes. For the sake of the test a new pair of keys will be generated every time and can be discarded. Due to the demo nature of this code, it is understood that the whole flow has been over-simplified. Generally, the architecture would be that the functionalities are broken into multiple APIs for authenticating user and authenticating JWT.
